name: Cybertroniq Marble 2020
description: The objective of Cybertroniq Marble 2020 is to earn 20 points on each level in order to achieve the golden marble. Attempting to obtain it before 20 points activates a glitch in the Marble Matrix known as the Marble Matrix Time Freeze, which is not possible to escape. The game is based on an in-depth philosophy of consciousness and learning how to navigate. Also, watch out for the Parallel Time Shifts, as aiming too early, you may have to face the consequences. Can you master the mysterious ways of the Cybertroniq Marble and obtain the Golden Cybertroniq Marble 2020 to score 2020 points? Only time will tell. Good luck dear soul. May you succeed.
